overview:
Currently VP of Product Development at VisualCV.com and member of the Executive Management Team.

Before joining Phillip Merrick and Clint Heiden at VisualCV.com last year, Scott was the Chief Information Officer (CIO) of webMethods. He was with webMethods for many years - from one of the most successful software IPOs in history in 2000, through years of explosive hypergrowth fueled by several acquisitions, to the successful sale of webMethods to Software AG in 2007.

Before joining webMethods in 2000, Scott spent most of his career designing, developing, and deploying Knowledge Management, Imagery, and Geographic Information Systems (GIS) for the U. S. Intelligence Community.

Learn more about Scott by checking out his detailed VisualCV at http://www.visualcv.com/scottherman.
